DOL English:
Học viện Tiếng Anh Tư Duy
đầu tiên tại Việt NamLinearthinking: Học Tiếng Anh theo logic và bản chất

Nền tảng công nghệ toàn diện và đột phá

Đội ngũ giáo viên giỏi và tận tâm

Chuyên đào tạo IELTS, SAT và Junior cấp 2
Mission Statement: To deliver high-quality IELTS and English education using innovative methods such as 'Linear Thinking' while ensuring clear learning outcomes.
Core Values: Innovation in education through unique teaching methodologies; Dedication to student success and confidence-building; Personalized support and flexibility to cater to individual needs.
Products or Services: High-quality IELTS preparation courses, including on-site and online options; A proprietary learning platform, Super LMS, for personalized self-learning; Courses designed to improve all English skills, including listening, speaking, reading, and writing, with clear and actionable progress tracking.
Industry or Market: Education and Test Preparation, specifically focusing on IELTS and English language learning.
Key Achievements: High success rates with students achieving significant improvements in their IELTS scores; Strong testimonials about the effectiveness of the 'Linear Thinking' methodology in enhancing speaking and writing skills.
Vision for the Future: To become a leading name in English education, providing effective tools and support to help students achieve their goals confidently and efficiently.
Engagement/Call-to-Action (CTA): If you’re looking to excel in IELTS or improve your English proficiency, explore their courses and resources on DOL English's official website. Their innovative approach could be the key to your success! For a detailed understanding, visit their site to explore their course offerings, methodologies, and success stories.
CEO: Lê Đình Lực. Recognized for innovation in education; Developed Linear Thinking methodology and proprietary tools. Leading the company to global English education; Continues to innovate in teaching methodologies.Education Leadership.
